data.name: RTK13WPK - Added Bonus, Original Event "The Other Three Kingdoms" "The Return of Xu Shu" 追加特典オリジナルイベント②「裏・三國志」「徐庶の戦い」
data.detailed_description:
※Valid only for Romance of the Three Kingdoms w/PUK.

Official additional events, "The Other Three Kingdoms" and "The Return of Xu Shu", will be included.

▼To Use
In "EDIT EVENTS" select "Create Event/Change Event" and proceed to "Copy Sample Event" to choose one of the scenarios listed above.
After this you will be able to use "Restrict Event" to apply it to the main game, or use "Change Event" to edit the details.
